name: The Hero who does not Remember
name_original: The Hero who does not Remember
description:
"Man's brain is originally like a little 'empty attic' and  it is a mistake to think that the little room has 'elastic walls', there comes a time, when for every addition of knowledge you forget something you knew before." 

-Sherlock Holmes, Study in Scarlet

Every ninja has a power of learning anything he wishes in no time. However... you being you, are not so good at it. You can only learn a limited things after which, to learn anything new you have to unlearn something...

Try solving the puzzles in each level to reach to the castle only with a limited abilities...

How to play

  • W-D to move Left and Right
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Mouse click to attack
  • To replace any ability with new one when popped up, click on the ability below, to not replace the ability click the cancel button on bottom right

Tips

  • To double jump try not to stick to the wall as it will be considered a wall jump
  • To double jump or wall jump a basic jump is must
  • Some times your limitations can create opportunities to overcome them

Made in 48 hours for BYOG GameJam 2020
